about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the hauntingly beautiful world of "The Lost" with its original soundtrack, a compelling auditory journey that encapsulates the essence of this enigmatic adventure game. Crafted by the composer Alejandro De La Cruz, this soundtrack is a masterful blend of orchestral grandeur, ambient soundscapes, and classical strings that perfectly complements the game's atmosphere.

COMPOSERS NOTE
"Creating the soundtrack for 'The Lost' has been an incredible journey. I aimed to weave together a tapestry of sound that not only supports the game's narrative but also stands on its own as an evocative and immersive listening experience. Each track is designed to transport you deeper into the world of 'The Lost,' echoing its themes of exploration, discovery, and the haunting beauty of the unknown." - Alejandro De La Cruz
